ing: 1/4 cup QuakerÂ® Oats (Quick or Old Fashioned, uncooked)
1 cup baby spinach leaves, tightly packed
1/2 cup cored and chopped green apple
des: "Start your day with this green power smoothie combining oats, coconut milk, spinach, parsley, apple, honey and lemon."
ins: Place all ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth.
